content:
On the evening of March 12, the russian occupation army fired a missile at Myrnograd in the Donetsk region. Two people were killed and four others were injured.

About thisinformsMinister of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Igor Klimenko.

“Late in the evening, the rocket was hit by Mirnograd in Donetsk region, partially destroyed by a five -storey building. Two people were killed, their bodies were debt from the rubble rescuers. Four people are injured, ”the message reads.

According to him, 6 more people are saved from the rubble, one of them.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Sumy after the Shahheda attack from the rubbleThey got10 people, are dead. NumberIncreasedup to four.
title: In Mirnograd from under the rubble of the house, the bodies of two dead people were taken
description: This was reported by the Minister of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Igor Klimenko. "Late at night...
author: Army Inform
